name: Ended Train
description:
Hello,Nerflin.

Now I'm gonna send you to 2minutes&21seconds before it happening.

Relax, take a train journey, you did this before, did you?

Just remember,You only got 2minutes.Put the device and stop it from happening.

How to play?

WASD for moving,

mouse to click the dialog,

E to set the device.

R to flashback.

[TIPS: You may have to retry 3 times to reach the Ending.]

What is this?

This is a creation from C-173-HGS team on gamejam "GameDev Insiders Jam #1"

Theme is ''if you stop, you die'',  We create this story in 3 days.

Who we are?

C-173-HGS TEAM!

Program "raceR404"

Graphic "Mashen"

Graphic "Sanyu&DFX"

mutual friend:) "Tony"
